events.message: The insured reported a collision involving their car and a lamppost on May 14th at approximately 3 PM.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to the nature of the vehicle collision described.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to handle this case and contact the customer for further details.
The customer received formal acknowledgment of their claim submission along with instructions for next steps.
Request sent to customer for police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and insurance paperwork.
Customer submitted all requested documentation including official police report and multiple vehicle damage photos.
Investigation of the accident details commenced by the claims adjuster reviewing all provided evidence.
The investigation was concluded with findings confirming the insured's vehicle sustained significant front-end damage.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering repair costs and a rental car reimbursement.
Customer responded to the settlement proposal with some questions about coverage details and timeframes.
The claim was officially approved based on the investigation findings and agreement on the settlement terms.
Payment covering the repair expenses and associated costs has been issued to the customerâ€™s account.
The auto accident claim has been closed successfully following the payment and confirmation from the customer.
